name: Naturerlebnisgarten Finkens Garten
description: Nature exploration for children, guided tours for kindergartens and primary school groups, family discovery days.

name: Flora & Botanischer Garten
description: Weekly Sunday tours, botanical walks, tropical greenhouse tours, and specialized plant exhibitions.

name: Forstbotanischer Garten
description: Public guided tours (typically 1st Saturday and 3rd Wednesday of the month) focusing on exotic trees and seasonal blooms.

name: Gut Leidenhausen (UBZ)
description: Environmental education center featuring a raptor station, forest museum, and the Wahner Heide information portal.

name: FREILUGA (Freiluft- und Gartenarbeitsschule)
description: Open house days, biology lessons in 'open-air classrooms,' and garden/nature workshops.

name: Lindenthaler Tierpark
description: Large annual events like the 'Waldmesse' (September), seasonal runs, and interactive nature scavenger hunts.

name: Rheinpark
description: Tours of park architecture and landscape, sculpture discovery walks, and garden history tours.

name: Wildpark Dünnwald
description: Regular public wildlife tours (2nd Wednesday of the month) focusing on deer, mouflon, and European bison.

name: Stadtgärtnerei Köln
description: 'Behind the scenes' tours showing the city's large-scale plant production for public parks.

name: Westfriedhof & Krematorium
description: Specialized technical tours of the crematorium and discovery tours of the historic cemetery grounds.
